mapper.select: SELECT b.bay_post_no, b.title, b.regdate, b.id, m.name, s.subject, b.subject_no FROM( SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY bay_post_no DESC) as rnum, bay_post_no, title, regdate, id, subject_no FROM bay_post )b, bay_member m,subject s WHERE b.id = m.id AND rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNumber} AND #{endRowNumber} AND b.subject_no = s.subject_no ORDER BY bay_post_no DESC
